name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: Learn the basics of creative writing and explore various genres including fiction, poetry, and creative nonfiction.

name: Writing for Beginners
description: Develop fundamental writing skills and gain confidence in expressing yourself through written language.

name: Grammar and Punctuation
description: Master the rules of grammar and punctuation to improve the clarity and effectiveness of your writing.

name: Intermediate Fiction Writing
description: Take your fiction writing to the next level with advanced techniques and in-depth analysis of published works.

name: Advanced Poetry Workshop
description: Explore the intricacies of poetry and experiment with new forms and techniques to take your poetry to the next level.

name: Creative Nonfiction Writing
description: Learn how to turn real-life experiences into compelling stories with this in-depth course on creative nonfiction writing.

name: Advanced Fiction Writing
description: Hone your fiction writing skills with advanced techniques and intensive practice in this challenging course.

name: Poetry Masterclass
description: Explore the art of poetry in-depth with this comprehensive course that covers everything from form to imagery.

name: Screenwriting
description: Learn how to write compelling and engaging scripts for film, television, and other visual media with this comprehensive course on screenwriting.
